The photograph does not show Dallas Jone: a member of U.S. President-elect Joe Biden's campaign team, being arrested for voter fraud. The expert's verdict clarifies that the person in the photo is actually actor Cuba Gooding Jr. who was arrested in June 2019 for allegedly groping a woman at a New York City bar.
The claim that Dallas Jones was arrested: S. President Donald Trump's campaign team. This claim was part of the misinformation spread on social media following the 2020 election.
The expert: s verdict emphasizes that Jones has not been arrested for voter fraud, and the allegations against him were found to be irresponsible and unfounded. The article also highlights the importance of fact-checking and urges readers to continue verifying information even after the election.
